description:
The Nightmare is healed, and as been training harder then she has before. She is still pissed she lost the championship last season and has no plans to lose this season. She know the Dragons weakness; fingers in the pussy.
The Dragon comes in heavier then she has ever been, it is not fat but MUSCLE she has been working out and training herself. The Dragon is in the best shape of her US career and healthy. She wants the overall title but something is standing in her way and it is called the NIGHTMARE!
title: The Nightmare (7-1) Ranked 2nd Dragon (20-5) Ranked 3rd
